mapper.sql: PROJECT_ID as projectId, CUSTOMER_SITE_ID as customerSiteID, PROJECT_NAME as projectName, PROJECT_PROCESS as projectProcess, PROJECT_TECH as projectTech, ATTENDANCE_TYPE as attendanceType, CREATE_TIME as createTime, CREATE_USER as createUser, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, UPDATE_USER as updateUser
mapper.select:
select a.PROJECT_ID as projectId, a.CUSTOMER_SITE_ID as customerSiteID, a.PROJECT_NAME as projectName, a.PROJECT_PROCESS as projectProcess, a.PROJECT_TECH as projectTech, a.ATTENDANCE_TYPE as attendanceType, b.STANDARD_MIN_TIME as standardMinTime, b.STANDARD_MAX_TIME as standardMaxTime, b.NOON_START as noonStart , b.NOON_END as noonEnd, b.EVENING_START as eveningStart, b.EVENING_END as eveningEnd from project a left join attendance_type b on a.ATTENDANCE_TYPE=b.ATTENDANCE_TYPE
where a.PROJECT_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{projectName},'%')
order by a.CREATE_TIME DESC
